reviewtext: This device may look simple, and that is because it is. you just hook it up and volia! Internet to all your devices, just don't forget to get a good router!  When it comes to networking I am not the brightest, but these were easy to figure out how to use and so far they work great.  They seem very sturdy and the wall mounts make they easily accessible.  We have two, one connected to the pcs and one that we use to connect all our gaming devices.
